Name: Cheery Scarf
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Wynaut and Wobbuffet.  You can get a Cheery Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Wynaut Tail, a Wynaut Card, and a Grin Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
